credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Project for a candelabrum
medium: Pen and ink, brush and wash on paper
description: A vase shaped stand upon a shaft to which lion chimaerae are fastened.  From a calyx on the top case rise two ivy stems carrying sockets with low burning candles and a socket shaped like a trumpet and carrying a fire.  Framing lines and margin.
name: drawing
